name: Godot 3D - Dungeon Crawler Demo
description:
This project was initially started last year. However that version of the project was lost and development had been halted indefinitely. But I decided to start it up again and remake it from the ground up. Controls are as follows

W- Move up

A- Turn left

D - Turn right

Space/Enter - Advance text/Interact

The missing pck file has been added. It should run now.
